item.name: buffers written directly by a backend
times a backend had to execute its own fsync
cache hit ratio
item.description: Check cache hit ratio in %.

item.name: number of active connections
item.description: Total count of active clients who connected to the PostgreSQL service and performing work.

item.name: number of idle connections
item.description: Total count of idle clients connected to the PostgreSQL service.

item.name: number of idle in transaction connections
item.description: Total count of idle clients who connected to the PostgreSQL service and have unfinished transaction. This client must be disconnected.

item.name: number of prepared connections
item.description: Total count of clients connected to the PostgreSQL service and blocked by others clients.

item.name: total connections
item.description: Total count of clients connected to the PostgreSQL service.

item.name: total connections (%)
item.description: Connections percentage of the maximum number of allowed connections (max_connections).

item.name: number of waiting connections
item.description: Total count of clients connected to the PostgreSQL service and blocked by others clients.

item.name: blocks hit per second
item.description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary (this only includes hits in the PostgreSQL buffer cache, not the operating system's file system cache)

item.name: blocks read per second
item.description: Number of disk blocks read

item.name: registered conflicts
item.description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details.).

item.name: registered deadlocks
item.description: Number of deadlocks detected.

item.name: temp_bytes written
item.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item.name: temp_files created
item.description: Number of temporary files created by queries. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item.name: tuples deleted per second
item.description: Number of rows deleted by queries.

item.name: tuples fetched per second
item.description: Number of rows fetched by queries.

item.name: tuples inserted per second
item.description: Number of rows inserted by queries.

item.name: tuples returned per second
item.description: Number of rows returned by queries.

item.name: tuples updated per second
item.description: Number of rows updated by queries.

item.name: commits per second
item.description: Number of transactions that have been committed.

item.name: rollbacks per second
item.description: Number of transactions that have been rolled back.
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.6/static/runtime-config-autovacuum.html#GUC-AUTOVACUUM-FREEZE-MAX-AGE
http://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.2/static/runtime-config-wal.html#GUC-FSYNC
http://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.2/static/runtime-config-wal.html#GUC-FULL-PAGE-WRITES
http://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.2/static/runtime-config-wal.html#GUC-SYNCHRONOUS-COMMIT

item.name: stand-by count
item.description: Streaming replication stand-bys count.

item.name: recovery state
item.description: Streaming replication state: t (true) if service is in recovery mode, and f (false) if server in master mode.

item.name: postgresql version
item.description: Connections percentage of the maximum number of allowed connections (max_connections).

item.name: WAL segments count
item.description: Number of WAL segments stored in pg_xlog directory.

item.name: WAL write
item.description: WAL write in bytes,.

discovery_rule.name: PostgreSQL databases discovery
discovery_rule.description: PostgreSQL database discovery. Use regular expressions to configure search.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: age(datfrozenxid)
item_prototype.description: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.6/static/runtime-config-autovacuum.html#GUC-AUTOVACUUM-FREEZE-MAX-AGE

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: age(datfrozenxid) (%)
item_prototype.description: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.6/static/runtime-config-autovacuum.html#GUC-AUTOVACUUM-FREEZE-MAX-AGE

item_prototype.name: database {#DBNAME} size
item_prototype.description: Single database size.

discovery_rule.name: PostgreSQL streaming stand-by discovery
discovery_rule.description: Low level discovery for streaming replication servers which connected to this server.

item_prototype.name: streaming lag with {#HOTSTANDBY} in seconds
item_prototype.description: ATTENTION: This check requires access to the remote server postgresql service, respectively, should be determined access in pg_hba.conf on remote server. Example: host zabbix postgres 1.2.3.4/32 trust

trigger_prototype.name: PostgreSQL packet loss between {HOSTNAME} and {#HOTSTANDBY} to high ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL streaming lag between {HOSTNAME} and {#HOTSTANDBY} to high ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL streaming lag between {HOSTNAME} and {#HOTSTANDBY} to high ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

discovery_rule.name: PostgreSQL database tables discovery
discovery_rule.description: PostgreSQL tables discovery. Use regular expressions to configure search. Disabled by default because may add too many items.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} indexes size
item_prototype.description: PostgreSQL all indexes size which belongs to a single table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} size
item_prototype.description: PostgreSQL single table size.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: analyzes
item_prototype.description: Number of analyze operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: autoanalyzes
item_prototype.description: Number of autoanalyze operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: autovacuums
item_prototype.description: Number of autovacuum operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: cache blocks hits per second
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in this table

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: cache blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: index blocks hit per second
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in all indexes on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: index blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from all indexes on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: index scans
item_prototype.description: Number of index scans initiated on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: tuples read per second by index scans
item_prototype.description: Number of live rows fetched by index scans.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: dead rows
item_prototype.description: Estimated number of dead rows.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: live rows
item_prototype.description: Estimated number of live rows.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows deleted per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows deleted.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows HOT updated per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required).

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows inserted per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows inserted.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows updated per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows updated.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: sequential scans
item_prototype.description: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: tuples read per second by sequential scans
item_prototype.description: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks hits per second from TOAST indexes
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table index (if any).

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks read per second from TOAST indexes
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table index (if any).

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks hits per second from TOAST
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table (if any).

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks read per second from TOAST
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table (if any).

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} stat: vacuums
item_prototype.description: Number of vacuum operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME}: table {#TABLENAME} rows count
item_prototype.description: PostgreSQL single table rows count.

trigger.name: PostgreSQL active transaction to long on {HOSTNAME} (time={ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL cache hit ratio too low on {HOSTNAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL idle in transaction connections to high on {HOSTNAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL idle transaction to long on {HOSTNAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL number of waiting connections to high on {HOSTNAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL required checkpoints occurs to frequently on {HOSTNAME}
PostgreSQL total number of connections to high on {HOSTNAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
PostgreSQL waiting transaction to long on {HOSTNAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
